title: Daily reminder not to chase Singed
body: Enemy team has 1 person down and their inhibitor is exposed. Singed is proxy farming bot. My team decides to send 2 people bot to deal with the Singed, even though I tell them to ignore him. The dead person on their team comes back up, and it becomes a 3 v 4 mid. We can't retreat, cuz mobility creep, and we get wrecked. Enemy team proceeds to snowball from that point and we lose. And the singed wasn't even fed. The Singed was 2 and 11. TLDR PLEASE ignore Singed. He does not split push well at all. Kill his team while he afk farms and win.

replies.body: Don't listen to this man, he's out of his mind! You totally have a chance of catching up to me and killing me! Look at my score! I'm 2/10/4. What? Don't mind my 369 CS! I'm feeding! Come and get me! Free gold!!

> [{quoted}](name=TequilaZombie,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=qTOLL1ZY,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-26T02:31:06.221+0000)
>
> Don't listen to this man, he's out of his mind! You totally have a chance of catching up to me and killing me! Look at my score! I'm 2/10/4. What? Don't mind my 369 CS! I'm feeding! Come and get me! Free gold!!

This is my favorite post.
{{champion:27}} {{item:3512}} I dare you to ignore Singed now.
